name: Orion (itch) (Bardon)
description:
Here you control a spaceship in the space (2D) on the left side, you fly up and down. From the right side come alien-spaceships which you must destroy. On the right side you see your energy; when you collide with an enemy or an enemy reaches the left side you lose energy. You can collect the green diamonds or kill the enemies to get energy. There are eight levels.

You control your ship with the cursor-keys, shooting is with left control-key.

Music is by Boris Grabule.
